hero.title: Maraba da Cibiyar ANIC
hero.subtitle: Mabudin ilimi da imani a Babura. Muna hidima ta ibada, karatu da taimako.

prayers.title: Sallolin Rana-Rana
prayers.description: Sallah biyar da Juma’a a taro

education.title: Makarantar Musulunci
education.description: Koyar da Al‑Qur’an da ilimin zamani ga kowane zamani

dawah.title: Shirin Da’aawa
dawah.description: Tattaunawa tsakanin addinai da wayar da kai

community.title: Tallafi ga Al’umma
community.description: Rarraba zakka da taimakon masu bukata

cta.title: Ka Aiko Da Tallafi Don Al’ummar Mu
cta.subtitle: Taimakon ka yana taimakawa wajen ci gaba da aikinmu
